name: Text Cultivation
description:
Text Cultivation is a simplified cultivation simulator.

Get enough Qi to Level up and then Break Through to higher Major Levels until you reach Immortality.

If you roll for the best stats, you have chosen Super Easy Mode, cultivation is not balanced, at all, not even once, in any media!

Ps.: Try and hack the save file, I dare you! Not you Thor, I know you can.
